value:
Summoning is a pretty sweet gig,
huh? Just summon up some Heroes,
then sit back while they do the rest.

I was raised in the Deeprealms. It was
there my father taught me martial arts
and how to buttle.$k$pThat is, how to serve as a butler.

All this summoning must make you
thirsty. Do you want some coffee or
tea? I recommend my coffee.

Sooo tired... Doesn't look like we're
moving out any time soon, so maybe
I'll take a nap.$k$pYou should take one too.

I baked some sweets for everyone.
They were a big hit, so maybe I'll
show off another hidden talent...

Hi there. I'm here with greetings
from $Nf.$k$pSince I'm here, want to see
a neat trick?

Ta-daaa... Guess that means
I'm pretty strong now.
Will this make my chores easier?
Didn't change as much as I'd hoped.

Maybe my coffee will be even better
now. Wanna taste test for me?

It's good to meet you. I'm Dwyer...
My father is Jakob... Anyway, what
am I doing here?

Well, if it isn't $Nu.
What's on your mind?
I'll listen if you talk.$k$pYou're a little sleepy? Well, I can put
some coffee on if you'd like. It'll wake
you up for sure.$k$pBut if I was you, I'd opt for a nice,
long nap. My coffee is good, but
nothing beats sleeping.$k$pWhether it's coffee or a good nap, I
always try to experience the best
each has to offer.$k$pAnyway, don't push yourself too hard.
When you aren't your usual peppy
self, it throws me off too.$k$pIt makes me worry about you.$k$pSo you decided to take a nap, huh?
Good choice. I'll wake you with the
scent of fresh coffee, so rest up.$k$pOh, and thanks for everything, our
great and powerful summoner.
Get out of my way!
Let's get this over with.
You're wide open.
I hate doing this.
Guess that's itâ€¦
Whaa?
Oh. I'll do my job.
Don't push yourself...
Are you tired? I could make you a cup of coffee...
You're going to give me a shoulder rub? How thoughtful...
Don't rest so you can work hard... Work hard so you can rest.
If I have to be a Hero, I guess I'll be a better Hero than my father.
I avoid complications whenever I can, but I don't mind working for you. What do you say to that, oh great and powerful Summoner?
Yeah...
Dwyer...
Take it easy.
